page.title: 05A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A MUM
page.content: I{wake up}and have some minutes to myself before waking the family. We {chat over breakfast.Children}go to school then I do the washing. After a coffee{I visit the dentist and lie in {his chair shaking from head to toe.}I rush home to prepare the lunch for the children. After lunch I have a quick glance at the newspaper. After that it is back to work tidying rooms and making beds. I stop to wash my hair, then I{relax with a cup of coffee.}I start ironing and then children arrive home with{Barry starving as usual, {heading straight for the kitchen}while {Martine helps}with the ironing. Start preparing dinner for{Dad coming home. {Later Dad and Barry leave for golf {while I prepare supper for the golfers {return.}Kids to bed after supper.{I {watch T.V.until 10.30p.m. then I go to {bed.
